ygData.subject: I will Survive (Lunarpine goes Motown)

Subject: I will Survive (Lunarpine goes Motown)
Message-ID: <8md79f+uk0e@...>
In-Reply-To: <20000804013124.20570.qmail@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 835
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: cyberwolf4@...

Lunarpine remained in wolf mode as he limped along. he could feel 
pressure on his internal damage. Slowly he worked his way back 
towards the Ark, He knew he had to make it back to the ship, he 
couldn't die in such a stupid pigheaded way. He'd promised Shadow 
Wing that he'd protect her, The wolf had to make it back. He took no 
pride in his stupidity and he knew that Shadow Wing wouldn't let him 
forget it."Maybe death would be preferable." he thought, he laughed, 
pain shot through his receptors. He wasn't far from Maximal scanners 
now and it wouldn't be long until they could find him. The scavengers 
circled above him, he could hear the preditors in the distance, but 
this wolf wasn't on the menu.

He had promises to keep

And miles to go before he sleeps.

(Gold star for anyone who can say where I paraphrased.)
